mapper.insert: insert into product_inquiry(pi_seq, pi_type, pi_content, product_seq, member_seq) values(SEQ_PRODUCT_INQUIRY_PI_SEQ.nextval, #{pi_type}, #{pi_content}, #{product_seq}, #{member_seq})
mapper.select: select * from product_inquiry order by pi_seq desc
mapper.update: update product_inquiry set pi_answer=#{pi_answer} where pi_seq=#{pi_seq}
